translation: Hear thou the threefold division of intellect and firmness, according to the Gunas, as I declare them fully and distinctly, O Arjuna.
commentary: 18.29 of intellect? difference division? of firmness of patience? f and? Eve even? Qualitatively according alities? threefold threefold? hear hear? Prochyamanam as I declare? Infinitely fully? separately distinctly? Dhananjaya O Dhananjaya.Commentary Dhananjaya The coneror of wealth Arjuna is so called because he acired much material and spiritual wealth during his tours of conest (Digvijaya) to the four arters of the earth.
